text:
If I have a template that has a missing quote e.g href="

I got this message printed out on the command line, but I am not receiving any 
call in the ErrorListener.

[Fatal Error] familyTree.xsl:17:3: The value of attribute "href" must not contai
n the '<' character.
creator: clau@ca.ibm.com
scott_boag@lotus.com
text:
The error message is produced from Xerces.  I don't think Xalan can do anything 
about it... it happens when you just parse the document.  Also, given <a 
href="> I don't think the error is all that unreasonable.
